ygData.subject: Ignatius' run
ygData.msgSnippet: shots of all strengths and types whuzzed past Ignatius as he flew for his life. The Predacon attackers had him outnumbered, outgunned, and outout of luck.

shots of all strengths and types whuzzed past Ignatius as he flew for his l=
ife. The Predacon attackers had him outnumbered, outgunned, and outout of l=
uck. various shots struck the Eagle in flight sending him into a tailspin. =
He transformed to bot mode turning, ready to fire at the pursuing bots. In =
the distance he saw the smoke as the Trainers base burned to the ground. He=
 saw Slayer, even through the disguise he remembered him. 

"You called me =
a traitor then bring this upon our unit?" The bot was alone, afraid, lookin=
g for someone to blame for the damage. "You brought them here, you dropped =
the defences, you destroyed everything we had hoped to learn. He leapt in t=
he air flapping his wings to push himself higher. The shots were hitting hi=
m hard but in his state of mind he could't have cared. He lifted his talons=
 fireing 25  shots from his talons, and two missles from his left arm at th=
e Trainer in disguise.
